title: Useful Text Preprocessing on the datasets
description: Text PreprocessingText preprocessing made on the competition datasets. The preprocessing consists of 4 steps:  Removing tags and URIs from contents Removing punctuation from titles and contents Removing stopwords from titles and contents Converting the tags from string to a list of tags  This type of operations can be used as a first step for any other process regarding the competition.
